title: Silk handkerchief pasta with pesto
description: A pasta and pesto dish from Liguria, home of the best basil in Italy, giving us the famous pesto al Genovese.
ingredients: 250g/9oz Italian ‘00’ flour, plus extra for dusting
large bunch of small-leaved basil, about 50 leaves
80g/3oz parmesan or pecorino (or alternative vegetarian hard cheese), freshly grated
